OCC.DAT:
variables datetime DIS(yyyymmddhhnnss) DTNOW string STRFOLDER string UTL_CONTEXT1 ; Context variable 1 string UTL_CONTEXT2 ; Context variable 2 string UTL_DBNAVLIST ; See constant string UTL_DLUPENTLST ; See constant string UTL_ENTSTATUS ; Std trigger string UTL_INPUT string UTL_MNUDISABLE ; Disable menu options string UTL_MODE string UTL_OUTPUT string UTL_PENDACT ; Pending action string UTL_TPL ; See constant string UTL_TPLVER ; See constant string UTL_TRGSTATUS ; Std trigger string UTL_WRUPENTLST ; See constant endvariables #define BreakInheritance_cpt_GENERAL #Comment start_of_mappings #ifdefined UENTITY #info symbol UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UENTITY=SINV1500.SMM #Comment
#ifdefined UNQ_UENTITY #info symbol UNQ_UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UNQ_UENTITY=SINV1500 #Comment
#Comment end_of_mappings

entry LP_EXECOP variables string strInst string strStatus string strPrinter, strBranch datetime dtDate, dtDateFrom, dtDateTo numeric numPerc string strParam ;pJMb001 string strProcessDir ;pJMb001 string strSuccessDir ;pJMb001 string strFailureDir ;pJMb001 string strDirectories ;pJMb001 endvariables
;Initialise les parametres specifiques a l'application activate "SMM_GNRLTOOL".InitDefault()
selectcase operation.BUTTONS_1 case "GETFTPDOC" call LP_GETFTPDOC ;pJMb001 START NEW CODE if ($status < 0) return ($status) endif strParam = paramlist.SINV1500 ;Retrieve parameters for EDI folders based on parameter from SMM_SINV1500_BA1 clear/e "SPAR0113" company.SPAR0113/init = $item("COMPANY",strParam) branch.SPAR0113/init = $item("BRANCH",strParam) warehouse.SPAR0113/init = $item("WAREHOUSE",strParam) vrwgroup.SPAR0113/init = "WHSEEDI" retrieve/e "SPAR0113" setocc "SPAR0113",1 while ($status > 0) selectcase (vrwcdtype.SPAR0113) case "EDIFILELOC" strProcessDir = narrative.SPAR0113 case "EDISUCCESS" strSuccessDir = narrative.SPAR0113 case "EDIFAILURE" strFailureDir = narrative.SPAR0113 endselectcase setocc "SPAR0113", $curocc(SPAR0113) + 1 endwhile if ((strProcessDir = "") | (strSuccessDir = "") | (strFailureDir = "")) message/error "Missing EDI file parameters for Branch «%%branch.SPAR0113%%%» and Warehouse «%%warehouse.SPAR0113%%%»" clear/e "SPAR0113" return (-1) endif clear/e "SPAR0113" strDirectories = "EDIFILELOC=%%strProcessDir%%%&uSEP;EDISUCCESS=%%strSuccessDir%%%&uSEP;EDIFAILURE=%%strFailureDir%%%" activate "SMM_SINV1500_003".AutoCreateLoad (strParam, strDirectories) if ($procerror) call X_ONERRORGEN ("", $procerror, $procerrorcontext) return (-1) endif ;pJMb001 END NEW CODE endselectcase call X_MESSAGE("IC_JOBFINISHED") return End
entry LP_GETFTPDOC variables boolean bWhBourret ;True when warehouse = BOURRET ;pJMb002 string strCo, strBr, strWh string strAcct, strAcctPwd, strFtpDir, strFileName, strWorkDir string strFileCheck, strFile, strFileList, strFolderName string strMess, strCommand, strParam, strFtpServer, strEdiDir numeric numIndex, numValue numeric nPos ;pJMb003 string strWinSCPDir ;pJMb003 endvariables
strWorkDir=$ldir() strAcct="" strAcctPwd="" strFtpDir="" strParam=paramlist.SINV1500 strFtpServer=$logical("smm_ftpserver")
strCo=$item("COMPANY",strParam) strBr=$item("BRANCH",strParam) strWh=$item("WAREHOUSE",strParam) clear/e "SPAR0113" company.SPAR0113/init=strCo branch.SPAR0113/init=strBr warehouse.SPAR0113/init=strWh vrwgroup.SPAR0113/init="WHSEEDI" retrieve/e "SPAR0113" setocc "SPAR0113",1 while ($status>0) selectcase vrwcdtype.SPAR0113 case "FTPACCOUNT" strAcct=narrative.SPAR0113 case "FTPPWD" strAcctPwd=narrative.SPAR0113 case "FTPFILEDIR" strFtpDir=narrative.SPAR0113 case "EDIFILELOC" strEdiDir=narrative.SPAR0113 endselectcase setocc "SPAR0113", $curocc(SPAR0113)+1 endwhile
if (strAcct="" | strAcctPwd="" | strFtpDir="") call X_MESSAGE("EC_FTPACCTERR") return -1 endif strFtpDir="%%strWorkDir%%%%%strFtpDir%%%"
strFolderName="%%strFtpDir%%%\TEMP" ;Check if local temp folder exist if ($lfileexists(strFolderName) = 0) call X_MESSAGE("EC_FOLDERERR") return -1 endif
;Check if files exists in local temp folder and cleanup strFileList=$dirlist(strFolderName,"File") if (strFileList!="") numIndex=1 getitem strFile, strFileList, numIndex while ($status > 0) strFile="%%strFolderName%%%\%%strFile%%%" filedelete strFile numIndex=numIndex+1 getitem strFile, strFileList, numIndex endwhile endif
;pJMb003 START NEW CODE ;WinSCP command is located in O:\SIP\WinSCP strWinSCPDir = $logical("udk_winscppath") ;pJMb003 END NEW CODE
;Build ftp command file to get ftp files ;pJMb002 call LP_BUILDFTP("MGET",strAcct,strAcctPwd,strFtpDir,strFileName) bWhBourret = ((strCo == "MITCHEL") & (strBr == "MD") & (strWh == "BOURRET")) ;pJMb002 call LP_BUILDFTP ("MGET", strAcct, strAcctPwd, strFtpDir, bWhBourret, strFileName) ;pJMb002 if ($status<0) call X_MESSAGE("EC_FILEERR") return -1 endif ;pJMb003 strCommand="ftp -i -s:%%strFtpDir%%%\%%strFileName%%% %%strFtpServer%%%" strCommand = "%%strWinSCPDir%%%winscp.com /script=%%strFtpDir%%%\%%strFileName%%%" ;pJMb003 activate "OS".COMMANDOUT(strCommand,strMess)
;Check if FTP Successfully transferred if (strMess!="") putmess strMess ;pJMb003 numValue = $scan(strMess,"226 Successfully transferred") ;pJMb003 if (numValue=0) ;pJMb003 START NEW CODE numValue = $scan (strMess, "System Error") ;pJMb003 if (numValue > 0) ;pJMb003 END NEW CODE call X_MESSAGE("EC_FTPGETERR") return (-1) endif ;if (numValue > 0) endif ;if (strMess!="")
;Check if files exists in local temp to continue process. strFileList=$dirlist(strFolderName,"File") if (strFileList!="") ;Build ftp command file to delete ftp files ;pJMb002 call LP_BUILDFTP("MDELETE",strAcct,strAcctPwd,strFtpDir,strFileName) call LP_BUILDFTP ("MDELETE", strAcct, strAcctPwd, strFtpDir, bWhBourret, strFileName) ;pJMb002 if ($status<0) call X_MESSAGE("EC_FILEERR") return -1 endif ;pJMb003 strCommand="ftp -i -s:%%strFtpDir%%%\%%strFileName%%% %%strFtpServer%%%" strCommand = "%%strWinSCPDir%%%winscp.com /script=%%strFtpDir%%%\%%strFileName%%%" ;pJMb003 activate "OS".COMMANDOUT(strCommand,strMess)
;Copy files to the specific folder to be process by the SMM import service strEdiDir="%%strWorkDir%%%%%strEdiDir%%%" ;pJMb002 call LP_TRANSFER_FILES(strWh,strFolderName,strEdiDir) call LP_TRANSFER_FILES (strWh, strFolderName, strEdiDir, bWhBourret) ;pJMb002 endif
return 0 End
entry LP_BUILDFTP params string strOption :IN string strAcct :IN ;USERNAME string strAcctPwd :IN ;PASSWORD string strFtpDir :IN boolean pbWhBourret :IN ;True when warehouse = BOURRET string strFileName :OUT endparams variables string strFile string strFtpServer ;pJMb003 endvariables
;pJMb003 strFile="%%strAcct%%%%%^%%strAcctPwd%%%" ;pJMb003 START NEW CODE strFtpServer = $logical("smm_ftpserver") ;ASN FILE: smm_ftpserver=ftp.ml-group.com strFile = "open ftp://%%strAcct%%%:%%strAcctPwd%%%@%%strFtpServer%%%" strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^lcd %%strFtpDir%%%\temp" ;pJMb003 END NEW CODE selectcase (strOption) case "MGET" ;Build mget ftp file ;pJMb003 strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^lcd %%strFtpDir\temp%%%" ;pJMb003 ;pJMb002 strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^mget *.csv" ;pJMb003 ;pJMb002 START NEW CODE ;pJMb003 if (pbWhBourret) ;pJMb003 strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^mget BOURRET_EXP_*.txt" ;pJMb003 else ;pJMb003 strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^mget *.csv" ;pJMb003 endif ;if (bWhBourret) ;pJMb002 END NEW CODE ;pJMb003 START NEW CODE if (pbWhBourret) strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^get BOURRET_EXP_*.txt" else strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^get *.csv" endif ;if (bWhBourret) ;pJMb003 END NEW CODE strFileName = "balesfiles-get.ftp" case "MDELETE" ;Build mdelete ftp file ;pJMb003 ;pJMb002 strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^mdelete *.csv" ;pJMb003 ;pJMb002 START NEW CODE ;pJMb003 if (pbWhBourret) ;pJMb003 strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^mdelete BOURRET_EXP_*.txt" ;pJMb003 else ;pJMb003 strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^mdelete *.csv" ;pJMb003 endif ;if (bWhBourret) ;pJMb003 ;pJMb002 END NEW CODE ;pJMb003 START NEW CODE if (pbWhBourret) strFile = "%%strFile%%%%%^rm BOURRET_EXP_*.txt" else strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^rm *.csv" endif ;if (bWhBourret) ;pJMb003 END NEW CODE strFileName="balesfiles-del.ftp" endselectcase ;selectcase (strOption)
;Cleanup old ftp file lfiledelete "%%strFtpDir%%%\%%strFileName%%%"
;pJMb003 strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^close" ;pJMb003 strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^bye" strFile="%%strFile%%%%%^exit" ;pJMb003 lfiledump strFile, "%%strFtpDir%%%\%%strFileName%%%" if ($status<0) return -1 endif return 0 done
entry LP_TRANSFER_FILES params string strExtWhse :IN string strFolderName :IN string strEdiDir :IN boolean pbWhBourret :IN ;True when warehouse = BOURRET endparams variables string strFileList, strFile, strEdiFile numeric numIndex endvariables
strFileList=$dirlist(strFolderName,"File") if (strFileList!="") numIndex=1 getitem strFile, strFileList, numIndex while ($status > 0) $dtnow$=$datim strEdiFile="%%strEdiDir%%%\%%strExtWhse%%%_%%$dtnow$%%%_%%strFile%%%" ;pJMb002 START NEW CODE if (pbWhBourret) ;File extension is .txt, but must be .csv for future SMM processing strEdiFile = $replace (strEdiFile, 1, ".txt", ".csv", -1) endif ;if (pbWhBourret) ;pJMb002 END NEW CODE strFile="%%strFolderName%%%\%%strFile%%%" lfilecopy strFile, strEdiFile if ($status=0) filedelete strFile endif numIndex=numIndex+1 getitem strFile, strFileList, numIndex endwhile endif return End
entry LP_BEFEXEC done
entry LP_AFTEXEC done
entry LP_BEFEDIT done
entry LP_AFTEDIT done
entry LP_BEFINIT done
entry LP_AFTINIT done
entry LP_BEFCLEANUP done
entry LP_AFTCLEANUP done
entry LP_BEFCLR done
entry LP_AFTCLR done
entry LP_BEFSTOR done
entry LP_AFTSTOR done
entry LP_BEFRETR done
entry LP_AFTRETR done
entry LP_BEFACPT done
entry LP_AFTACPT done
entry LP_BEFQUIT done
entry LP_AFTQUIT done
entry LP_BEFMNUS done
entry LP_AFTMNUS done
entry LP_BEFPRNT done
entry LP_AFTPRNT done
entry LP_BEFPULS done
entry LP_AFTPULS done
entry LP_BEFASYS done
entry LP_AFTASYS done
entry LP_BEFFRGF done
entry LP_AFTFRGF done
entry LP_BEFFRLF done
entry LP_AFTFRLF done
entry LP_BEFRETS done
entry LP_AFTRETS done
entry LP_BEFERAS done
entry LP_AFTERAS done
entry LP_BEFUKYS done
entry LP_AFTUKYS done
;AUTHOR : Georges Moiny, Compuware Montreal ;DESC : ;CREATED: 20/05/1999 ;============================= MOD HISTORY ============================== ;TAG DATE DESCRIPTION ;MOD.1 070699 RETRIEVE_SEQ is made independant of RETRIEVE ;======================================================================== operation INIT call LP_BEFINIT #for ITEM=(<UTL_CTELIST>) $<ITEM>$="<<ITEM>>" #endfor call X_INITFORM call LP_AFTINIT end
operation CLEANUP call LP_BEFCLEANUP call X_CLEANUPFORM call LP_AFTCLEANUP end
operation Y_EXEREAD end
operation Y_EXEWRIT end
operation Y_EXELOCK $status=-1 $result=-1 end
operation Y_EXEDELE end
operation Y_EXEWRUP end
operation Y_EXEDLUP end
operation Y_EXEAIO $status=-1 $result=-1 end
operation Y_EXERMO $status=-1 $result=-1 end
operation Y_REFRESH params string strEntname :IN string strEntity :IN string strMode :IN string strParam :IN endparams activate $instancename.BEFREFRESH(strEntname,strEntity,strMode,strParam) if($status=0) call X_REFRESH(strEntname,strEntity,strMode,strParam) if($status=0) activate $instancename.AFTREFRESH(strEntname,strEntity,strMode,strParam) endif endif return end
operation Y_EXEHLPE end
operation Y_EXEDTLE end
operation Y_EXEOGF end
operation Y_EXEMNUE end
operation Y_EXELMO end
operation Y_EXELMK end
operation Y_EXEVLDO end
operation Y_EXEVLDK end
operation Y_EXEERRE end
operation Y_EXERETS $result = -1 $status = -1 end
operation Y_EXEERAS $result = -1 $status = -1 end
operation Y_EXEUKYS end
operation Y_EXECLR end
operation Y_EXERETR $result = -1 $status = -1 end
operation Y_EXESTOR $result = -1 $status = -1 end
operation Y_EXEACPT end
operation Y_EXEQUIT end
operation Y_EXEMNUS end
operation Y_EXEPRNT end
operation Y_EXEPULS end
operation Y_EXEFRGF end
operation Y_EXEFRLF end
operation Y_EXEASYS end
operation Y_EXEOP variables string strEntity endvariables selectcase option.BUTTONS_1 case "D" ;Direct execution putlistitems/occ strEntity,"<UENTITY>" call LP_EXECOP clear/e "<UENTITY>" getlistitems/occ/init strEntity,"<UENTITY>" case "S" ;Scheduled execution creocc "MASTCDUL",-1 taskno.MASTCDUL="" validatefield taskno.MASTCDUL servid.MASTCDUL=$$acr_batserver component.MASTCDUL=$componentname operation.MASTCDUL=operation.BUTTONS_1 userid.MASTCDUL=$$acr_userid rectype.MASTCDUL=1 ;Daily dailyopt.MASTCDUL=1 ;Each nn days dailynbdays.MASTCDUL=1 ;Interval = 1 freqtype.MASTCDUL=2 ;At specified time recstartdt.MASTCDUL=$date+1 ;Start tomorrow ;pJMb001 cdultime.CDULTIME=$time ;... at the same time cdultime.CDULTIME=$clock ;... at the same time ;pJMb001 status.MASTCDUL=2 ;Inactive seqno.MASTCDUL=1 ;By default priority.MASTCDUL=5 putlistitems/occ input.MASTCDUL,"<UENTITY>" setocc "MASTCDUL" store/e "MASTCDUL" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("STORE",$status,"") rollback else commit call X_MESSAGE("IC_TASKCREATED") endif case "B" ;Background execution creocc "EXEQUEUE",-1 jobno.EXEQUEUE="" validatefield jobno.EXEQUEUE taskno.EXEQUEUE="" servid.EXEQUEUE=$$acr_batserver component.EXEQUEUE=$componentname operation.EXEQUEUE=operation.BUTTONS_1 userid.EXEQUEUE=$$acr_userid status.EXEQUEUE=1 ;Active priority.EXEQUEUE=5 putlistitems/occ input.EXEQUEUE,"<UENTITY>" setocc "EXEQUEUE" store/e "EXEQUEUE" if($status<0) call X_ONERRORDBIO("STORE",$status,"") rollback else commit call X_MESSAGE("IC_JOBCREATED") endif endselectcase done
operation BEFREFRESH params string strEntname :IN string strEntity :IN string strMode :IN string strParam :IN endparams return end
operation AFTREFRESH params string strEntname :IN string strEntity :IN string strMode :IN string strParam :IN endparams end
operation BEFREAD end operation EXEREAD end operation AFTREAD end
operation BEFWRIT end operation EXEWRIT end operation AFTWRIT end
operation BEFLOCK end operation EXELOCK end operation AFTLOCK end
operation BEFDELE end operation EXEDELE end operation AFTDELE end
operation BEFWRUP end operation EXEWRUP end operation AFTWRUP end
operation BEFDLUP end operation EXEDLUP end operation AFTDLUP end
operation BEFAIO end operation AFTAIO end
operation BEFRMO end operation AFTRMO end
operation BEFHLPE end operation AFTHLPE end
operation BEFDTLE end operation AFTDTLE end
operation BEFOGF end operation AFTOGF end
operation BEFMNUE end operation AFTMNUE end
operation BEFLMO end operation AFTLMO end
operation BEFLMK end operation AFTLMK end
operation BEFVLDO end operation AFTVLDO end
operation BEFVLDK end operation AFTVLDK end
operation BEFERRE end operation AFTERRE end

trigger error ;call X_ONERRORFLD
trigger loseFocus ;call SMM_DOC_LF

trigger detail call X_UTL_DDCL("DET")
trigger error call X_ONERRORFLD
trigger help call X_UTL_DDCL("HLP")
trigger startModification call X_UTL_DDCL("SMOD")
trigger loseFocus call X_UTL_DDCL("LF")
trigger menu call X_UTL_DDCL("MNU")
trigger getFocus call X_UTL_DDCL("FGF")
trigger valueChanged call X_UTL_DDCL("VC")
trigger validate call X_UTL_DDCL("VF")

trigger error call X_ONERRORFLD
trigger next call X_NEXTFIELD
trigger previous call X_PREVFIELD
trigger getFocus call X_FLDGF
